verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi came כִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> chish-Mo-a' heard כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- all הַמְּלָכִ֡ים <WH4428> ham-me-la-Chim And it came to pass when all the kings אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּעֵ֨בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver which [were] on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֜ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den Jordan בָּהָ֣ר <WH2022> ba-Har in the hills וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֗ה <WH8219> u-vash-she-fe-Lah, and in the valleys וּבְכֹל֙ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all ח֚וֹף <WH2348> Chof and in all the coasts הַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> hai-Yam sea הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol, of the great אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- over מ֖וּל <WH4136> mul over against הַלְּבָנ֑וֹן <WH3844> hal-le-va-Non; Lebanon הַֽחִתִּי֙ <WH2850> ha-chit-Ti the Hittite וְהָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ve-Ha-'e-mo-Ri, and the Amorite הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanite הַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> hap-pe-riz-Zi, the Perizzite הַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> ha-chiv-Vi the Hivite וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> ve-hay-vu-Si. and the Jebusite

וַיִּֽתְקַבְּצ֣וּ <WH6908> vai-yit-kab-be-Tzu That they gathered יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> yach-Dav, themselves together לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <WH3898> le-hil-la-Chem to fight עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' with Joshua וְעִם־ <WH5973> ve-'im- and with יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; and with Israel פֶּ֖ה <WH6310> peh accord אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. with one פ Peh

וְיֹשְׁבֵ֨י <WH3427> ve-yo-she-Vei And when the inhabitants גִבְע֜וֹן <WH1391> giv-'on of Gibeon שָׁמְע֗וּ <WH8085> sha-me-'U, heard אֵת֩ <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what עָשָׂ֧ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah had done יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' what Joshua לִֽירִיח֖וֹ <WH3405> li-ri-Cho unto Jericho וְלָעָֽי׃ <WH5857> ve-la-'Ai. and to Ai

וַיַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su They did work גַם־ <WH1571> gam- also הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> hem-mah like בְּעָרְמָ֔ה <WH6195> be-'a-re-Mah, wilily וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> vai-ye-le-Chu and set וַיִּצְטַיָּ֑רוּ <WH6737> vai-yitz-tai-Ya-ru; and made as if they had been ambassadors וַיִּקְח֞וּ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu and took שַׂקִּ֤ים <WH8242> sak-Kim sacks בָּלִים֙ <WH1087> ba-Lim old לַחֲמ֣וֹרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH2543> la-cha-Mo-rei-Hem, upon their asses וְנֹאד֥וֹת <WH4997> ve-no-Dot bottles יַ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> ya-yin and wine בָּלִ֔ים <WH1087> ba-Lim, old וּמְבֻקָּעִ֖ים <WH1234> u-me-vuk-ka-'Im and rent וּמְצֹרָרִֽים׃ <WH6887> u-me-tzo-ra-Rim. and bound up

וּנְעָל֨וֹת <WH5275> u-ne-'a-Lot shoes בָּל֤וֹת <WH1087> ba-Lot And old וּמְטֻלָּאוֹת֙ <WH2921> u-me-tul-la-'Ot and clouted בְּרַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7272> be-rag-lei-Hem, upon their feet וּשְׂלָמ֥וֹת <WH8008> u-se-la-Mot garments בָּל֖וֹת <WH1087> ba-Lot and old עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem; on וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> ve-Chol and all לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem upon them and all the bread צֵידָ֔ם <WH6720> tzei-Dam, meat יָבֵ֖שׁ <WH3001> ya-Vesh was dry הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah had become נִקֻּדִֽים׃ <WH5350> nik-ku-Dim. [and] mouldy

וַיֵּלְכ֧וּ <WH1980> vai-ye-le-Chu went אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' to Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh unto the camp הַגִּלְגָּ֑ל <WH1537> hag-gil-Gal; at Gilgal וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru and said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> 'e-Lav about וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to him אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish unto him and to the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz country רְחוֹקָה֙ <WH7350> re-cho-Kah from a far בָּ֔אנוּ <WH935> Ba-nu, We be come וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah now כִּרְתוּ־ <WH3772> kir-tu- now therefore make לָ֥נוּ La-nu בְרִֽית׃ <WH1285> ve-Rit. ye a league

וַיֹּאמְרוּ vai-yo-me-ru כוַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer answer קאִֽישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- And the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַחִוִּ֑י <WH2340> ha-chiv-Vi; unto the Hivites אוּלַ֗י <WH194> 'u-Lai, Peradventure בְּקִרְבִּי֙ <WH7130> be-kir-Bi among אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you יוֹשֵׁ֔ב <WH3427> yo-Shev, ye dwell וְאֵ֖יךְ <WH349> ve-'Eich how; אֶכְרֹות־ 'ech-rot- כאֶֽכְרָת־ <WH3772> 'ech-rot- make לְךָ֥ <WH3772> le-Cha us and how shall we make קבְרִֽית׃ <WH1285> ve-Rit. a league

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dei-cha We [are] thy servants אֲנָ֑חְנוּ <WH587> 'a-Na-che-nu; we וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶ֧ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem then יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua מִ֥י <WH4310> mi Who אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> 'at-Tem are you וּמֵאַ֥יִן <WH370> u-me-'A-yin unto them Who [are] ye;and from whence תָּבֹֽאוּ׃ <WH935> ta-Vo-'u. come

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, about מֵאֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz country רְחוֹקָ֤ה <WH7350> re-cho-Kah far מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> me-'Od unto him From a very בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u are come עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dei-cha, thy servants לְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> le-Shem because of the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for שָׁמַ֣עְנוּ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-nu for we have heard שָׁמְע֔וֹ <WH8089> sha-me-'O, the fame וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher he עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah of him and all that he did בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> be-mitz-Ra-yim. in Egypt

וְאֵ֣ת׀ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who עָשָׂ֗ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah, And all that he did לִשְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> lish-Nei to the two מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei kings הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver that [were] beyond הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den; Jordan לְסִיחוֹן֙ <WH5511> le-si-chOn to Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king חֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <WH2809> chesh-Bon, of Heshbon וּלְע֥וֹג <WH5747> u-le-'og and to Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan of Bashan אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּעַשְׁתָּרֽוֹת׃ <WH6252> be-'ash-ta-Rot. which [was] at Ashtaroth

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru spake אֵלֵ֡ינוּ <WH413> 'e-Lei-nu about זְֽקֵינֵינוּ֩ <WH2205> ze-kei-nei-Nu Wherefore our elders וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all יֹשְׁבֵ֨י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei and all the inhabitants אַרְצֵ֜נוּ <WH776> 'ar-Tze-nu of our country לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, to us saying קְח֨וּ <WH3947> ke-Chu Take בְיֶדְכֶ֤ם <WH3027> ve-yed-Chem with you צֵידָה֙ <WH6720> tzei-Dah victuals לַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> lad-De-rech, for the journey וּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> u-le-Chu and go לִקְרָאתָ֑ם <WH7125> lik-ra-Tam; to meet וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH559> va-'a-mar-Tem them and say אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem to עַבְדֵיכֶ֣ם <WH5650> 'av-dei-Chem unto them We [are] your servants אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <WH587> 'a-Nach-nu, we וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah now כִּרְתוּ־ <WH3772> kir-tu- therefore now make לָ֥נוּ La-nu בְרִֽית׃ <WH1285> ve-Rit. ye a league

זֶ֣ה׀ <WH2088> zeh This לַחְמֵ֗נוּ <WH3899> lach-Me-nu, This our bread חָ֞ם <WH2525> cham we took hot הִצְטַיַּ֤דְנוּ <WH6679> hitz-tai-Yad-nu [for] our provision אֹתוֹ֙ <WH854> o-To out מִבָּ֣תֵּ֔ינוּ <WH1004> mib-Bat-Tei-nu, out of our houses בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom on the day צֵאתֵ֖נוּ <WH3318> tze-Te-nu we came forth לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> la-Le-chet to come אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem; to you וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah now הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin-Neh behold יָבֵ֔שׁ <WH3001> ya-Vesh, unto you but now behold it is dry וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become נִקֻּדִֽים׃ <WH5350> nik-ku-Dim. and it is mouldy

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh These נֹאד֤וֹת <WH4997> no-Dot And these bottles הַיַּ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> hai-Ya-yin of wine אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מִלֵּ֣אנוּ <WH4390> mil-Le-nu which we filled חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <WH2319> cha-da-Shim, [were] new וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold הִתְבַּקָּ֑עוּ <WH1234> hit-bak-Ka-'u; and behold they be rent וְאֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh and these שַׂלְמוֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH8008> sal-mo-Tei-nu and these our garments וּנְעָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5275> u-ne-'a-Lei-nu, and our shoes בָּל֕וּ <WH1086> ba-Lu are become old מֵרֹ֥ב <WH7230> me-Ro long הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> had-De-rech journey מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. by reason of the very

וַיִּקְח֥וּ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu took הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> ha-'a-na-Shim And the men מִצֵּידָ֑ם <WH6718> mitz-tzei-Dam; of their victuals וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et פִּ֥י <WH6310> pi not [counsel] at the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo and did not שָׁאָֽלוּ׃ <WH7592> sha-'A-lu. and asked

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as made לָהֶ֤ם la-Hem יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom, peace וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> vai-yich-Rot with them and made לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem בְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> be-Rit a league לְחַיּוֹתָ֑ם <WH2421> le-chai-yo-Tam; with them to let them live וַיִּשָּׁבְע֣וּ <WH7650> vai-yish-sha-ve-'U sware לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, נְשִׂיאֵ֖י <WH5387> ne-si-'Ei and the princes הָעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah. of the congregation

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, came מִקְצֵה֙ <WH7097> mik-Tzeh And it came to pass at the end שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> she-Lo-shet of three יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> ya-Mim, days אַחֲרֵ֕י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- they כָּרְת֥וּ <WH3772> ka-re-Tu they had made לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem בְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> be-Rit; a league וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֗וּ <WH8085> vai-yish-me-'U, with them that they heard כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for קְרֹבִ֥ים <WH7138> ke-ro-Vim that they [were] their neighbours הֵם֙ <WH1992> hem like אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, about וּבְקִרְבּ֖וֹ <WH7130> u-ve-kir-Bo among הֵ֥ם <WH1992> hem they יֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <WH3427> yo-she-Vim. and [that] they dwelt

וַיִּסְע֣וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U journeyed בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיָּבֹ֛אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to עָרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5892> 'a-rei-Hem unto their cities בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi; on the third וְעָרֵיהֶם֙ <WH5892> ve-'a-rei-Hem Now their cities גִּבְע֣וֹן <WH1391> giv-'on [were] Gibeon וְהַכְּפִירָ֔ה <WH3716> ve-hak-ke-fi-Rah, and Chephirah וּבְאֵר֖וֹת <WH881> u-ve-'e-Rot and Beeroth וְקִרְיַ֥ת ve-kir-Yat יְעָרִֽים׃ <WH7157> ye-'a-Rim. and Kirjathjearim

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo did not הִכּוּם֙ <WH5221> hik-Kum smote בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because נִשְׁבְּע֤וּ <WH7650> nish-be-'U had sworn לָהֶם֙ la-Hem נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> ne-si-'Ei them not because the princes הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah, of the congregation בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto them by the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיִּלֹּ֥נוּ <WH3885> vai-yil-Lo-nu murmured כָל־ <WH3605> chol and the whole הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah And all the congregation עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against הַנְּשִׂיאִֽים׃ <WH5387> han-ne-si-'Im. against the princes
